parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To throw (cast, put) out; I banish; I bring forth, produce. From ek and ballo; to eject.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From en and brimaomai; to have indignation on, i.e. to blame, to sigh with chagrin, to sternly enjoin.
